title: How to Make Gai Yang

steps.headline: Chop 2 cloves of garlic in fine pieces and a few sprigs of fresh coriander.
Turn the chicken skin side down and score the underside with a knife.
steps.description: This will allow the meat to absorb the flavours of the marinade.

steps.headline: Place the chicken in a bowl and add the chopped garlic, coriander, light soy sauce, caster sugar, and salt.
Work the ingredients into the chicken using your hands, making sure that it becomes fully coated in the marinade.
Cover with cling film and leave to marinate for 30 minutes.
Preheat the grill to a high temperature and place the chicken on it.
steps.description: Grill for about 20 minutes, turning over occasionally, until the chicken appears golden brown and blackened in places.

steps.headline: Remove the chicken from the grill, cut it in half, and serve.

text: Chop 2 cloves of garlic in fine pieces and a few sprigs of fresh coriander.  Turn the chicken skin side down and score the underside with a knife. This will allow the meat to absorb the flavours of the marinade. Place the chicken in a bowl and add the chopped garlic, coriander, light soy sauce, caster sugar, and salt.  Work the ingredients into the chicken using your hands, making sure that it becomes fully coated in the marinade.  Cover with cling film and leave to marinate for 30 minutes.  Preheat the grill to a high temperature and place the chicken on it. Grill for about 20 minutes, turning over occasionally, until the chicken appears golden brown and blackened in places. Remove the chicken from the grill, cut it in half, and serve.
